channel.title: Need help
channel.description: Please I need help I've got a server ready but every time I attempt to compile it, it says "system cannot find the path specified" Idk It might just me missing something but if you know whats wrong PLEASE HELP ME.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

The default username is “Admin” and password should be admin aswell.
Try with “Admin” And “Password” If this doesnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Br3akMe Br3akMe
item.description:
@Br3akMe wrote:

TOMSCAPE BETA:

You have to login to your router using the above address or use http://www.routerlogin.net/ you then need to browse the control panel for the segment which allows you to open up your ports. You should know your router login.

I cant find out how to login to my router.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

(and if you want to know what portforwarding is before you do anything)

It’s (very basically) allowing connections from computers that are not on your network to connect to your server when you are running it through the .bat file. It’s pretty important if you’re planning on letting other people play too.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Br3akMe, post:11, topic:388314”][quote author=Tobbescape link=topic=484138.msg3551378#msg3551378 date=1301552658]
You have to open a port on your router, the default router IP is: 192.168.1.1
Try that one, and look for port triggering and port forwarding.
You will have to open the port: 43594. Pm me if you need help.
[/quote]
That made no sense to me.[/quote]

You have to login to your router using the above address or use http://www.routerlogin.net/ you then need to browse the control panel for the segment which allows you to open up your ports. You should know your router login.

Read full topic

You will have to open the port: 43594. Pm me if you need help.[/quote]

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

You have to open a port on your router, the default router IP is: 192.168.1.1
Try that one, and look for port triggering and port forwarding.
You will have to open the port: 43594. Pm me if you need help.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“Br3akMe, post:6, topic:388314”][quote author=Primadude link=topic=484138.msg3547424#msg3547424 date=1301264570]
Right click the compiler file, either click “edit”, or “edit with” (Edit it with notepad), then copy and paste the code into a post here :).
[/quote]

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/quote]

What version of Java are you running, and is your computer 32-bit or 64-bit?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Br3akMe Br3akMe
item.description:
@Br3akMe wrote:

Primadude:

Right click the compiler file, either click “edit”, or “edit with” (Edit it with notepad), then copy and paste the code into a post here :).

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause
